password, RSA encrypted client side

unique request ID to be presented by requestor at poll time - must not be transferred or displayed
refresh interval with which requestor should call PollAuthSessionStatus
the confirmation types that will be able to confirm the request

partial-authentication token - limited lifetime and scope, included only if credentials were valid
If this is set to a token owned by this user, that token will be retired
if challenge is old, this is the new client id
if challenge is old, this is the new challenge ID to re-render for mobile confirmation
if login has been confirmed, this is the requestor's new refresh token
if login has been confirmed, this is a new token subordinate to refresh_token
whether or not the auth session appears to have had remote interaction from a potential confirmer

whether this login has seen high usage recently
